title: The Sculpted Silence of Sue Henderson
summary: Sue Henderson, a 34-year-old programmer with a passion for sculpting, uncovers her supernatural gift to control sound, which she uses to confront and ultimately defeat a malevolent tech tycoon.
summaryGerman: Sue Henderson, eine 34-jährige Programmiererin mit einer Leidenschaft für Bildhauerei, entdeckt ihre übernatürlichen Fähigkeiten, Sound zu kontrollieren, die sie nutzt, um einen bösartigen Technologie-Tycoon zu konfrontieren und letztendlich zu besiegen.
summaryDutch: Sue Henderson, een 34-jarige programmeur met een passie voor beeldhouwen, ontdekt haar bovennatuurlijke gave om geluid te beheersen, die ze gebruikt om een kwaadaardige tech-tycoon te confronteren en uiteindelijk te verslaan.
summaryFrench: Sue Henderson, une programmeuse de 34 ans passionnée de sculpture, découvre son don surnaturel de contrôler le son, qu'elle utilise pour affronter et finalement vaincre un tyran technologique malveillant.

story.text: Sue discovers her unique power while sculpting in her studio, noticing that her movements silence the bustling city sounds outside her window.
Inspired by her newfound abilities, Sue begins experimenting with controlling sound waves, using her programming skills to enhance her control.
Sue prevents an accident by silencing an out-of-control car alarm that was distracting drivers nearby.
At work, Sue uses her powers to secretly help her colleagues focus by dampening disruptive office noise, which improves overall productivity.
Sue's actions catch the attention of a corrupt tech tycoon, who seeks to exploit her powers for his personal gain.
Sue confronts the tycoon at a tech expo, revealing his malicious intentions to the public using her powers to hijack the sound system.
As the city cheers her on, Sue returns to her studio, humbled and more determined than ever to use her powers for good.

moral: Use your unique talents to make a positive difference in the world, no matter how small.
ending: With a new purpose, Sue sculpts a statue of silence, forever marking the week she became a hero.
